Container.Name: Dropbox
Container.Description: [b]What is Dropbox?[/b][br/] [br/] [b]Container Volumes:[/b][br/] * /dropbox/Dropbox : Dropbox user files. This is your sync'd folder[br/] * /dropbox/.dropbox-dist : Dropbox user application. This contains the app so that if it auto-updates, restart of the docker won't break it.[br/] * /dropbox/.dropbox : Dropbox user configi files. Take care as this controls the linkage to your account[br/] [br/] [b]Network Ports:[/b][br/] * 17500 : Dropbox LAN sync[br/] * 17500/udp : Dropbox LAN sync[br/] [br/] [b]Environment Variables:[/b][br/] * DROPBOX_USER: Dropbox user (default: nobody)[br/] * DROPBOX_USERID: Dropbox user id (default: 99)[br/] * DROPBOX_GROUP: Dropbox user group (default: users)[br/] * DROPBOX_GROUPID: Dropbox user group id (default: 100)[br/] [br/]
